Public Remarks: This elegant bungalow-ranch home, nestled on a sought-after street in the vibrant heart of Willow Glen, is sure to capture your heart. The house integrates classic charm with modern aesthetics, creating a balance between old-world charm and contemporary living. The renovated kitchen, situated at the core of the home, boasts shaker cabinets, sleek honed granite countertops, and state-of-the-art stainless-steel appliances. It is complemented by a wrap-around breakfast bar and a cozy dining nook. The kitchen flows into a welcoming living area adorned with rich oak hardwood floors and a wood-burning fireplace. The private, primary bedroom suite features an attached luxurious bathroom, a double vanity with marble countertops, and an oversized shower stall. Two spacious guest bedrooms share a stylish hall bathroom, outfitted with beautiful marble floors, a shaker vanity topped with a marble counter, and original cast iron bathtub. Beyond the main living spaces, discover a detached studio, a sanctuary for artists, yogis, or anyone in pursuit of a quiet haven for inspiration. This unique space invites endless possibilities for creativity and solitude. You will fall in love with this classic Willow Glen charmer!

Located within walking distance to downtown Lincoln Ave, the home effortlessly integrates the indoor and outdoor spaces to create a serene and inviting atmosphere. Large windows flood the interior with natural light, highlighting the modern touches and newer oak floors, creating an ambiance of warmth. The French doors from both the main suite and an extra bedroom effortlessly open up the interior to the newly landscaped backyard, complete with fruit trees, white rose bushes, newly planted privacy trees, and vegetable planters, creating an ideal space for unwinding or entertaining. The spacious primary suite with walk-in closet has a spa-like bath for relaxing after a long day. Meanwhile, two additional bedrooms share an updated bathroom, providing comfort and style for family or guests. The convenient proximity to vibrant downtown Willow Glen ensures easy access to the area's bustling shopping and dining scene, while the home's serene surroundings provide an idyllic backdrop for gatherings and celebrations. Furthermore, the property is equipped with a Lifesource whole house water filtration system, enhancing the quality of everyday living.

Public Remarks: Welcome to an extraordinary new home nestled in the highly sought-after Willow Glen community, and situated in the coveted Booksin Elementary School district. This 4-bedroom home embodies superior craftsmanship and opulent finishes, accentuated by the added convenience of a fully owned solar system and prepped for an electric vehicle charger. The main level offers a Great Room featuring a sleek fireplace, connected to an Epicurean's Kitchen adorned with top-tier appliances & a spacious island. The first level floor plan further boasts a mud room, guest en-suite, and a half bath. Upstairs the primary suite awaits with a custom walk-in closet & a lavish bath that includes a Badeloft soaking tub, an expansive glass-enclosed shower, & dual vanities. Two additional bedrooms, a full bath, and a generously sized laundry room round out the second level. The spacious and private backyard offers an ample covered patio with skylights perfect for outdoor entertaining. Additional details of this property include wire-brushed natural white oak flooring, designer plumbing, and light fixtures, prepped for a water filtration system, dual-zone high-efficiency HVAC, NEST doorbell, CAT-6 wiring, multimedia panel, and custom stamped hardscaping, and so much more.

Combo box located on front porch, between the chairs under the table on the ground - not attached to anything. Dog and indoor cats on site - do NOT OPEN 3rd bedroom, that DOOR must remain CLOSED. Seller will coordinate private showing of this room separately. Window AC unit was recently installed in the living room, it is very easy to add or remove and can convey with the home if desired. Seller will need a rent back.
Public Remarks: Beautifully remodeled Willow Glen home just minutes from downtown. Stunning 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom with hardwood floors throughout. Enjoy the abundance of natural light with multiple skylights, separate living room & open kitchen and dining area plus a second family room. Gorgeous Spanish wood framed glass doors & built-ins throughout with tons of storage space. Double French doors open to the backyard perfect for relaxing or entertaining with a custom gas fire pit, built-in bbq & beverage center, pergola plus a variety of fruit trees and drought resistant landscaping. Attached garage with loft & extra of storage. Perfect location with easy access to shopping, restaurants, parks, CalTrain & HWY 87. Award-winning Booksin Elementary. Don't miss out on this charming Willow Glen home!
